data.name: Roblox in 2016
data.description:
This theme is a combination of all of 2016, and how it would merge with the modern features of the roblox website. 

Keep in mine this is my first (wip) css code, and I added on to GalactiCosmo's "Roblox: Old Light Theme."

Please let me know if there are any bugs because I would be happy to fix any.

data.name: mail.yandex.ru ads trick/Яндекс почта без рекламы
data.description:
A tricky way to hide yandex mail ads.

Скрывает отвратительную рекламу в яндекс почте (левый блок опускает далеко вниз, а рекламу в списке писем перекрывает так, что она не видна и не может быть нажата).

data.name: FV Battling
data.description:
Provides a few quality-of-life improvements for the battling system on FurVilla:
  • Condenses the page (less scrolling).
  • Opens the opponent's stats automatically.
  • Moves up the candycorn button; allows you to continue battling without exiting the modal.
  • Use your consumables at the end of the battle even when the modal is open.
  • Numbers the first page of the tourney leaderboard.
  • Moves the "Begin scrapping" button on blacksmith pages; allows you to continue scrapping without exiting the modal.
Under Customize Settings, you can number all pages of the leaderboard, disable the sliding animation, and move the end-of-battle stats up (ideal for shorter screens).
Please direct any comments, questions, concerns, issues, feedback, etc. here.
